bilibili.help: Send video ID for video information.
bilibili.help.regex.av: Send AV ID for video info.
bilibili.help.regex.bv: Send BV ID for video info.
bilibili.help.regex.url: Send short URL for video info.
bilibili.message.error.rejected:
The request was rejected because of the Bilibili security control policy. Please try again later.
If the error occurs repeatedly, please contact the developers to resolve the issue.
